exceptions.tactic: intros m n z H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros m n z H1 H2. split. - intros H3. induction n. + simpl. apply H3. + simpl. rewrite <- exd_cA_1. apply IHn. apply H3. apply H1. - intros H4. induction n. + simpl. apply H4. + simpl. rewrite <- exd_cA_1 in H4. apply IHn in H4. apply H4. apply H1.
